Rangers and the Belgian club have endured difficult starts to the season and both Russell Martin and Thorsten Fink have uncertain futures. arts.ttl: Rangers vs Genk predictions: Genk to deny Gers a much-needed win
arts.sum: Rangers have made a miserable start to the season and Tom McGarry expects that to continue as he sees them as unlikely winners at home to Genk.
